菾菾菾

菾字的基本解释

菾
tián
〔菾菜〕即“甜菜”，一种草本植物，根肥大，含有糖质，是制糖的主要原料之一。

菾
tiàn
草木茂盛。

菾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tián］
［《廣韻》徒兼切，平添，定。］
见“菾菜”。

菾字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　菾； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1040第15
【廣韻】徒兼切，音恬。【玉篇】菜名。【本草註】菾通甜，因其味微甜也。【類篇】菾菜，治病?。　又【集韻】他念切，音忝。草木長茂貌。

菾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
菾字的起名意思

指菾菜，也可形容草木茂盛。

菾
Basic explanation of words
菾
tián
〔菾菜〕refers to "beet", a herbaceous plant with a large root and containing sugar, which is one of the main raw materials for sugar production.
菾
tiàn
The vegetation is lush.
菾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tián］
["Guangyun" is both apprentice and cut, flattened, fixed. ]
See "菾菜".
菾
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　菾; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1040 15
[Guang Yun] Apprentice and cut, sound and timid. 【Jade articles】The name of the dish. [Materia Medica] Sutong is sweet because of its slightly sweet taste. 【Classes】Sweet vegetables, cure diseases?.　[Jiyun] He reads "Qi", the sound is strong. The vegetation is long and lush.
菾
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
菾
Name meaning
Refers to green vegetables, and can also describe lush vegetation.
tián
вм. 甜 в слове 甜菜
